div1.p: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington
In the Matter of the application of Charles M. Helmore for a Writ of Habeas Corpus vs. _________ } No. 3385 Appearance
To the Clerk of the above Entitled Court:

You will please enter our appearance as appearings for Charles M. Helmore in the above entitled cause, and service of all subsequent papers, except writs and process, may be made upon siad Attorney, by leaving the same with Welch & Dore
NOTICE -- Attorneys will please endorse their own Filings, Rule 11
